text: Segar Richard Bastard (25 January 1854 â€“ 20 March 1921) was an amateur English football player and referee. He played football for Upton Park F.C. and Trojans F.C.. He refereed a number of important matches, including FA Cup finals and Home Nations international matches. ==Sources== Category:1854 births Category:1921 deaths Category:English footballers
title: Segar Bastard
